texts.label: sText_TryToLearnMove2
texts.zh: 但是，{B_BUFF1}已经不能\n习得更多的技能。\p
texts.en: But, {B_BUFF1} can't learn\nmore than four moves.\p

texts.label: sText_TryToLearnMove3
texts.zh: 删除一个技能给\n{B_BUFF2}留下空间？
texts.en: Delete a move to make\nroom for {B_BUFF2}?

texts.label: sText_PkmnWasParalyzed
texts.en: {B_EFF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} is paralyzed!\nIt may be unable to move!

texts.label: sText_PkmnWasParalyzedBy
texts.en: {B_SCR_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}'s {B_SCR_ACTIVE_ABILITY}\n麻痹了 {B_EFF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}!\lIt may be unable to move!

texts.label: sText_PkmnSafeguardExpired
texts.zh: {B_ATK_PREFIX3}的一方\n不再受神秘护身保护了！
texts.en: {B_ATK_PREFIX3}'s party is no longer\nprotected by SAFEGUARD!

texts.label: sText_PkmnUproarKeptAwake
texts.zh: 但是，{B_SCR_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}的吵闹\n让它保持了清醒！

texts.label: sText_PkmnCantSleepInUproar
texts.zh: 但是，{B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}无法在\n吵闹中睡眠！

texts.label: sText_PkmnCantSleepInUproar2
texts.zh: 但是，{B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}在\n吵闹中不会睡着！

texts.label: sText_UproarKeptPkmnAwake
texts.zh: 但是，吵闹使得\n{B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}保持清醒！

texts.label: sText_PkmnTryingToTakeFoe
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} is trying\nto take its foe with it!

texts.label: sText_PkmnLaidCurse
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}减半了自身的HP，\n并给{B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}施加了诅咒！
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} cut its own HP and\nlaid a CURSE on {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}!

texts.label: sText_SpikesScattered
texts.zh: 铁菱已经遍布\n对手的周围！
texts.en: SPIKES were scattered all around\nthe opponent's side!

texts.label: sText_PkmnCutHPMaxedAttack
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}的HP减少了，\n并且攻击上升至最高！
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} cut its own HP\nand maximized ATTACK!

texts.label: sText_PkmnAnchoredItself
texts.zh: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}把自身\n用根茎紧紧固定住了！

texts.label: sText_PkmnWantsGrudge
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} wants the\nopponent to bear a GRUDGE!

texts.label: sText_PkmnLostPPGrudge
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}'s {B_BUFF1} lost\nall its PP due to the GRUDGE!

texts.label: sText_PkmnWaitsForTarget
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} waits for a target\nto make a move!

texts.label: sText_SoothingAroma
texts.zh: 一股沁心的香气\n弥漫了开来！
texts.en: A soothing aroma wafted\nthrough the area!

texts.label: sText_PkmnCantUseMoveTorment
texts.en: {B_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} can't use the same\nmove in a row due to the Torment!\p

texts.label: sText_PkmnCantUseMoveThroatChop
texts.en: {B_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} can't use\n{B_CURRENT_MOVE} due to Throat Chop!\p

texts.label: sText_HMMovesCantBeForgotten
texts.zh: 暂时无法忘记秘传技能。\p

texts.label: sText_PlayerBattledToDrawLinkTrainer
texts.en: Player battled to a draw against\n{B_LINK_OPPONENT1_NAME}!

texts.label: sText_PlayerBattledToDrawVsTwo
texts.en: Player battled to a draw against\n{B_LINK_OPPONENT1_NAME} and {B_LINK_OPPONENT2_NAME}!

texts.label: sText_NoRunningFromTrainers
texts.zh: 不可以！训练家要堂堂正正地\n面对战斗！\p
texts.en: No! There's no running\nfrom a TRAINER battle!\p

texts.label: sText_DontLeaveBirch
texts.zh: 小田卷博士：不要像那样不管我！\p
texts.en: PROF. BIRCH: Don't leave me like this!\p

texts.label: sText_ItHurtConfusion
texts.zh: 因混乱对自己\n造成了伤害！

texts.label: sText_FailedToSpitUp
texts.en: But it failed to SPIT UP\na thing!

texts.label: sText_FailedToSwallow
texts.en: But it failed to SWALLOW\na thing!

texts.label: sText_WindBecameHeatWave
texts.en: The wind turned into a\nHEAT WAVE!

texts.label: sText_StatChangesGone
texts.zh: 能力等级\n都还原成初始状态了！

texts.label: sText_TooWeakForSubstitute
texts.zh: HP太低了，\n以致无法制造替身！
texts.en: It was too weak to make\na SUBSTITUTE!

texts.label: sText_FaintInThree
texts.zh: 受到影响的宝可梦\n将在3回合内倒下！
texts.en: All affected POKéMON will\nfaint in three turns!

texts.label: sText_NoPPLeft
texts.en: There's no PP left for\nthis move!\p

texts.label: sText_ButNoPPLeft
texts.en: But there was no PP left\nfor the move!

texts.label: sText_EnemyAboutToSwitchPkmn
texts.zh: {B_TRAINER1_CLASS} {B_TRAINER1_NAME}\n就要换上{B_BUFF2}了。\p{B_PLAYER_NAME}要替换\n宝可梦吗？

texts.label: sText_OutOfSafariBalls
texts.zh: {PLAY_SE SE_DING_DONG}提示：\n你用完了原野球！游戏结束！\p
texts.en: {PLAY_SE SE_DING_DONG}ANNOUNCER: You're out of\nSAFARI BALLS! Game over!\p

texts.label: sText_ItDodgedBall
texts.zh: 它躲开了精灵球！\n这只宝可梦不能被收服！
texts.en: It dodged the thrown BALL!\nThis POKéMON can't be caught!

texts.label: sText_PkmnDataAddedToDex
texts.zh: {B_DEF_NAME}的数据\n登记到了宝可梦图鉴。\p

texts.label: sText_BoxIsFull
texts.zh: 盒子已经满了！\n不能再收服更多了！\p
texts.en: The BOX is full!\nYou can't catch any more!\p

texts.label: sText_YouThrowABallNowRight
texts.zh: 现在要扔出精灵球了是吧？\n我…我会全力以赴！
texts.en: You throw a BALL now, right?\nI… I'll do my best!

texts.label: sText_SwitchedAtkAndSpAtk
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}与目标交换了\n攻击和\p和特攻！
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} switched all its\nchanges to its Attack and\pSp. Atk with the target!

texts.label: sText_SwitchedDefAndSpDef
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}与目标交换了\n防御和\p和特防！
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} switched all its\nchanges to its Defense and\pSp. Def with the target!

texts.label: sText_PoisonSpikesScattered
texts.zh: 毒菱散落在\n对方队伍的脚下！
texts.en: Poison Spikes were scattered all\naround the opposing team's feet!

texts.label: sText_PkmnSurroundedWithVeilOfWater
texts.en: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} surrounded itself\nwith a veil of water!

texts.label: sText_PointedStonesFloat
texts.zh: 尖锐的岩石漂浮在了\n {B_DEF_TEAM2} 的队伍周围!
texts.en: Pointed stones float in the air\naround {B_DEF_TEAM2} team!

texts.label: sText_SwapsDefAndSpDefOfAllPkmn
texts.zh: 制造出了\n防御与特防能力值互换的奇妙空间!
texts.en: It created a bizarre area in which the\nDefense and Sp.Def stats are swapped!

texts.label: sText_HeldItemsLoseEffects
texts.zh: 制造出了\n道具无效的魔法空间!
texts.en: It created a bizarre area in which\nPokémon's held items lose their effects!

texts.label: sText_FreedFromSkyDrop
texts.zh: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} 从自由落体状态\n逃脱了!

texts.label: sText_WonderRoomEnds
texts.zh: 奇妙空间结束了,防御\n与特防能力值恢复了正常！
texts.en: Wonder Room wore off, and Defense\nand Sp. Def stats returned to normal!

texts.label: sText_MagicRoomEnds
texts.zh: 魔法空间结束了,道具\n效果恢复了正常！
texts.en: Magic Room wore off, and held items'\neffects returned to normal!

texts.label: sText_MudSportEnds
texts.en: The effects of Mud Sport have faded.

texts.label: sText_WaterSportEnds
texts.en: The effects of Water Sport have faded.

texts.label: sText_PsychicTerrainEnds
texts.zh: 脚下奇妙的感觉\n不见了.

texts.label: sText_PoisonHealHpUp
texts.zh: 毒素回复了{B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}\n的少量体力！

texts.label: sText_UnnerveEnters
texts.zh: 对手的队伍太紧张以致于\n无法吃下树果！
texts.en: The opposing team is too nervous\nto eat Berries!

texts.label: sText_ToxicSpikesAbsorbed
texts.zh: 毒菱从对方的队伍\n周围消失了！
texts.en: The poison spikes disappeared\nfrom around the opposing team's feet!

texts.label: sText_NotDoneYet
texts.zh: 这个招式的效果还没做完！\p
texts.en: This move effect is not done yet!\p

texts.label: sText_StickyWebUsed
texts.zh: 一张黏黏网展开在了{B_DEF_TEAM2}队伍的周围！
texts.en: A sticky web spreads out on the\nground around {B_DEF_TEAM2} team!

texts.label: sText_IonDelugeOn
texts.en: A deluge of ions showers\nthe battlefield!

texts.label: sText_TerrainBecomesElectric
texts.en: An electric current runs across\nthe battlefield!

texts.label: sText_TerrainBecomesPsychic
texts.zh: 脚下传来了奇妙的感觉！

texts.label: sText_AssaultVestDoesntAllow
texts.zh: {B_LAST_ITEM} 的效果让这个\n招式无法被使用!\p
texts.en: The effects of the {B_LAST_ITEM} prevent status\nmoves from being used!\p

texts.label: sText_GravityPreventsUsage
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} 不能使用 {B_CURRENT_MOVE}\n由于重力的影响!\p

texts.label: sText_MegaEvoReacting
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}的 {B_LAST_ITEM} 对 \n{B_ATK_TRAINER_NAME}'s 超级环有反应了!

texts.label: sText_Infestation
texts.en: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} has been afflicted\nwith an infestation by {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}!

texts.label: sText_PowderExplodes
texts.zh: 宝可梦身上的粉尘被火焰碰到后爆炸了！
texts.en: When the flame touched the powder\non the Pokémon, it exploded!

texts.label: sText_SpectralThiefSteal
texts.zh: {B_ATK_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} 偷取了目标\n提升的能力!

texts.label: sText_GravityGrounding
texts.zh: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} 因为重力\n不能停留空中!

texts.label: sText_FlowerVeilProtected
texts.en: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} surrounded itself\nwith a veil of petals!

texts.label: sText_SweetVeilProtected
texts.en: {B_DEF_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} surrounded itself\nwith a veil of sweetness!

texts.label: sText_NoOneWillBeAbleToRun
texts.zh: 在下一回合中\n没有宝可梦能够逃跑！
texts.en: No one will be able to run away\nduring the next turn!

texts.label: sText_AirLockActivates
texts.zh: 天气带来的效果\n消失了。

texts.label: sText_AuraBreakActivates
texts.zh: {B_SCR_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}反转了所有\n其它宝可梦的气场！

texts.label: sText_ScreenCleanerActivates
texts.en: All screens on the field were\ncleansed!

texts.label: sText_PkmnsWillPerishIn3Turns
texts.zh: 所有宝可梦都会在\n三回合后倒下！
texts.en: Both Pokémon will perish\nin three turns!

texts.label: sText_MicleBerryActivates
texts.zh: 通过使用{B_LAST_ITEM}\n{B_SCR_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX}提高了它的命中率！
texts.en: {B_SCR_ACTIVE_NAME_WITH_PREFIX} boosted the accuracy of its\nnext move using {B_LAST_ITEM}!

texts.label: gText_WhichMoveToForget4
texts.zh: {PALETTE 5}{COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_SHADOW DYNAMIC_COLOR4 DYNAMIC_COLOR5 DYNAMIC_COLOR6}要忘记\n哪个技能？
texts.en: {PALETTE 5}{COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_SHADOW DYNAMIC_COLOR4 DYNAMIC_COLOR5 DYNAMIC_COLOR6}Which move should\nbe forgotten?

texts.label: gText_WillChampionshipDreamComeTrue
texts.en: Will the championship dream come true?!\p

texts.label: sText_RefIfNothingIsDecided
texts.zh: 裁判：如果3回合无法决出胜负，\n将由我们来裁定结果！
texts.en: REFEREE: If nothing is decided in\n3 turns, we will go to judging!

texts.label: sText_RefThatsIt
texts.zh: 裁判：到此为止！现在将由我们\n裁定谁是胜利者！
texts.en: REFEREE: That's it! We will now go to\njudging to determine the winner!

texts.label: sText_RefJudgeMind
texts.zh: 裁判：判定类别 1，头脑！\n宝可梦展示出最大勇气！\p
texts.en: REFEREE: Judging category 1, Mind!\nThe POKéMON showing the most guts!\p

texts.label: sText_RefJudgeSkill
texts.zh: 裁判：判定类别 2，技巧！\n宝可梦最优化使用技能！\p
texts.en: REFEREE: Judging category 2, Skill!\nThe POKéMON using moves the best!\p

texts.label: sText_RefJudgeBody
texts.zh: 裁判：判定类别 3，身体！\n宝可梦拥有最强生命力！\p
texts.en: REFEREE: Judging category 3, Body!\nThe POKéMON with the most vitality!\p

texts.label: sText_RefPlayerWon
texts.zh: 裁判：裁定结果：{B_BUFF1}与{B_BUFF2}！\n胜利者是{B_PLAYER_NAME}的{B_PLAYER_MON1_NAME}！\p

texts.label: sText_RefOpponentWon
texts.zh: 裁判：裁定结果：{B_BUFF1}与{B_BUFF2}！\n胜利者是{B_TRAINER1_NAME}的{B_DEF_NAME}！\p

texts.label: sText_RefDraw
texts.zh: 裁判：裁定结果：3比3！\n你们打成了平手！\p
texts.en: REFEREE: Judgment: 3 to 3!\nWe have a draw!\p

texts.label: sText_DefeatedOpponentByReferee
texts.en: {B_PLAYER_MON1_NAME} defeated the opponent\n{B_OPPONENT_MON1_NAME} in a REFEREE's decision!

texts.label: sText_LostToOpponentByReferee
texts.en: {B_PLAYER_MON1_NAME} lost to the opponent\n{B_OPPONENT_MON1_NAME} in a REFEREE's decision!

texts.label: sText_TiedOpponentByReferee
texts.en: {B_PLAYER_MON1_NAME} tied the opponent\n{B_OPPONENT_MON1_NAME} in a REFEREE's decision!

texts.label: sText_QuestionForfeitMatch
texts.zh: 想放弃参赛资格，\n并退出比赛吗？
texts.en: Would you like to forfeit the match\nand quit now?

texts.label: sText_PlayerBattledToDrawTrainer1
texts.en: Player battled to a draw against\n{B_TRAINER1_CLASS} {B_TRAINER1_NAME}!

texts.label: gText_RecordBattleToPass
texts.zh: 你想将这场对战记录\n在你的开拓区通行证上吗？
texts.en: Would you like to record your battle\non your FRONTIER PASS?

texts.label: gText_BattleRecordedOnPass
texts.zh: {B_PLAYER_NAME}的对战结果\n已经记录在开拓区通行证上了。
texts.en: {B_PLAYER_NAME}'s battle result was recorded\non the FRONTIER PASS.
